lead_paragraph: A daughter of Geraldine Ferraro, the 1984 Democratic vice-presidential candidate, sees a trait shared by her mother and Hillary Clinton: grit.

headline.main: Geraldine Ferraro’s Daughter, on Her Mother and Hillary Clinton

snippet: A daughter of Geraldine Ferraro, the 1984 Democratic vice-presidential candidate, sees a trait shared by her mother and Hillary Clinton: grit.
